summary: Implement basic Payload Converters for the Ruby SDK to handle null, bytes, and JSON data types. This is a core feature needed to support serialization and deserialization of workflow and activity payloads.
userImpact: Without payload converters, users cannot properly serialize and deserialize data in workflows and activities, blocking core SDK functionality.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented in Ruby SDK to support null, bytes, and JSON payload converters
